Title: What is HappyMod?
Content: HappyMod is an app market dedicated to provide 100% working mods for millions of players. In this community, some users upload game mods, other users try these mods and verify whether they are working or not. Based on the contribution of millions of users every day, HappyMod can select verified working mods for you.

Title: Why should I use HappyMod app?
Content: Although you can download apk from HappyMod website, we still recommend you downloading HappyMod App to your phone. HappyMod app is the best downloader for mod files. Firstly, it can accelerate the speed for downloading big mod files. Second, you can get notice when your request mod was released. Finally, you can join the comment with millions of mod players.

Title: Is it safe to download mod apk on HappyMod?
Content: Yes. All uploads are manually vetted and approved. And, millions of users tried the mods and pick out the 100% working one, it is on the top of the game page. Therefore, if you download the app from HappyMod you should be safe.

Title: Who are we
Content: HappyMod is paltform for mod lovers to download, request and test android mods. HappyMod don't make the mods, and all the mods came from internet.Over 30,0000 android app mods can be downloaded here. And we will add more android mod apps.

Title: How does it work
Content: Upload Users and editors upload the lastest version mods to happymod, Verifty Millions of downloaded users comment the mods to help us picking out the best one, 100% working We recommended the 100% working one to happymod.

Title: Install HappyMod in 2 Steps
Content: Step 1. Enable the “Unknown Sources” Setting, Step 2. Find HappyMod APK File and Install HappyMod
